entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
